level.text: Every common carrier of passengers by water desiring to provide service as set forth in ยง1701 shall submit an original and twenty (20) copies of the following documents to the Public Service Commission:
Information demonstrating the type or types of service to be offered to the public;
The rates to be charged for the particular service;
All common carrier rules or regulations promulgated by the common carrier which apply to the particular service;
The name or names of the vessels providing the service and documents demonstrating that the United States Coast Guard has certified each vessel for passenger service;
Documents to establish that the vessels will be operated by persons licensed by the United States Coast Guard; and
Documents demonstrating that liability insurance is in effect with coverage sufficient to protect passengers, property and third persons not aboard the vessel.
Upon the filing of the information required by ยง1702.1, the transportation service described in ยง1701.1 shall go into effect.
